Sample Change Request Default Report

This sample Change Request report shows the title (formatted by ChangeDefault.Title), one group line (formatted by ChangeDefault.GrpInfo), and two records (each formatted by ChangeDefault.Group1). It shows only one group and its one record. However, most reports have several records in each group. The sample does not show the total (formatted by ChangeDefault.EndReport), but the last line would have been: Total: 4.
